oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harlow, Daniel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
General Relativity and Quantum Cosmology

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In these lectures I give an introduction to the quantum physics of black holes, including recent developments based on quantum information theory such as the firewall paradox and its various cousins. I also give an introduction to holography and the AdS/CFT correspondence, focusing on those aspects which are relevant for the black hole information problem.
